item.title: Rat infestation, 22nd October
item.description:
There is a growing rat infestaion in Fellows Court by cremer street. This is an increasing occurence where the pests are sighted repeatdely all day long. They are rapidly approaching drains,pipes and gardens which is affecting our homes.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Weymouth Terrace, Hackney, London

item.title: You need red light camera here., 23rd October
item.description:
I’m working on the railway at culvert road. And I have Witnessed 20 vehicles within 5 minutes run red lights. One was right to me. You need to install an enforcement camera here. This is beyond a joke

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Culvert Road, Clapham Junction, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned trailer and washing machine, 22nd October
item.description:
This is getting a bit ridiculous, this trailer has been completely abandoned on a single yellow line outside 69 Swallowfield for over 2 months. I can clearly see it has been reported 5 times - why has it not been removed?? It’s got to the point where people think it’s acceptable to leave their own junk next to it - see photo of a dumped washing machine. This is not related to the building works, it’s a dumped vehicle with a flat tyre, there’s clearly no intention of someone picking this up can you please remove it?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Swallowfield Road, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet
